generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the edges of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees.
- building: Buildings are visible on both sides of the road, including commercial structures with signs.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road and are present in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road and are also in motion on the road.
- bus: A white bus is parked on the right side of the road.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign on the left and a "Priority Road" sign in the distance.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
